body.name: Oxford Composition Notebook 6 Pack, College Ruled Paper, 5.75 x 8 Inches, Small Size, 60 Sheets, Kraft Covers (63831)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 38 mins
features: Save by the pack: Get 6 small (5.75" x 8") composition notebooks with Kraft covers; 60 sheets of white, college ruled paper in each; a stock-up staple for the classroom, homeschool or the office
These small composition books are the perfect size to take on the go; 5.75 x 8 notebooks fit in compact spaces, but with 60 sheets/120 pages, you still have plenty of room for notes
College ruled notebooks have more lines per page than wide ruled notebooks, so they fit more notes: 0.2" spacing between lines
These note books are perfect science notebooks, technical notebooks, and bullet journals; plus the covers are made from 100% recycled fiber and the paper is made from 50% recycled fiber
Sewn pages are permanently bound so they're more secure than spiral notebooks for notes; making them great daily journals and lab notebooks
body.description: Oxford composition notebook 6 packs have brown Kraft covers with matching Kraft spines. Each small 5.75" x 8" note book is great to take on the go. You'll get 6 Kraft composition books, each with 60 double-sided sheets/120 pages of white, college ruled paper. College ruled paper has skinny lines to fit more creative writing, journaling, note taking or lab work per page than wide ruled paper. Paper handles ink pens, colored pencils and highlighters for fun writing practice and beautiful notes. Center sewn pages make the composition notebook a teacher favorite. Use for school assignments, office tasks, or personal notes. College ruled paper. 5.75 x 8 inches (14.6 x 20.3 cm). 60 Sheets/120 pages. Kraft covers. 6 Pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Short Term Project Books
reviews.reviewText: When these first arrived I thought they were too small. I’m used to the standard black composition books, and these aren’t them.However, the size turns out to be a bonus, because they can be used for many things, but ESPECIALLY as a Project Notebook. Nice because most of my projects are short term and there are enough pages for each project.For instance, soon I’ll be starting a cosmetic remodel of my new house. I don’t need a giant project book, this one is just right. Same for using it as a vacation planner. And you can put identifying stickers or draw on the front, because the front is plain tan color. Lastly, they easily fit in my bag, and take up much less room than the regular size.These coming instead of the standard comp book was a happy accident. You might want to give them a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice small size and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for note taking
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for taking down notes or thoughts quickly. Easily fits in a small areas that a normal sized composition book wouldn't. Paper is very similar to the original size. Pens and pencils work great except for some gel pens still bleed through a little. Its everything you love from a bigger composition book, just smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Business Conferences
reviews.reviewText: I love having a smaller notebook for conferences where I can take all my notes for one conference in one place. It helps me keep things organized. These composition notebooks are perfect for exactly that. They are just the right size (both in terms of dimension and length). They would make a great addition to a swag bag for a conference and would be easy to stamp with a business logo. They feel like they are made of quality material and the stitching is strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are always great to have on hand. I love the recycled look of them. They're small, perfect for note taking. The pages are great and the sheet count is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable mini notebook
reviews.reviewText: These are great. They are standard (excellent) Oxford notebook quality - made really well, paper is thick enough that ink doesn't show through to the other side, binding is good enough for it to last. It's hard to find fault on this one. I love the plain cover so I write/decorate it. Depending on your pants, these can fit into your back pocket (more so for men since the pockets are bigger) - pair it up with those mini pens and you have a great portable notepad. Would highly recommend if you need a portable notebook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Working notebook working good enough.The style is kind of cool.Really small enough size working many place, no good for homework though.But WOrking good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size to keep notes!
reviews.reviewText: I like to put notes in this type of notebook because I don’t tear out the pages in case I need to reference back to something. This little notebook is perfect for that, it’s not really designed to tear them out. At 8 x 5 1/2 and only a quarter inch thick it’s a great size to throw in my handbag or laptop case!
